So he should be good, unless mods pk

item.title: [317][food command][317]
item.dc:creator: @zattion zattion
item.description:
@zattion wrote:

hey i got a food command like this:

if (command.startsWith("food") && playerRights >= 1){ addItem(391, 28); addItem(391, 28); addItem(391, 28); addItem(391, 28); addItem(391, 28); addItem(391, 28); addItem(391, 28); addItem(391, 28); addItem(391, 28); addItem(391, 28); addItem(391, 28); addItem(391, 28); addItem(391, 28); addItem(391, 28); addItem(391, 28); addItem(391, 28); addItem(391, 28); addItem(391, 28); addItem(391, 28); addItem(391, 28); addItem(391, 28); addItem(391, 28); addItem(391, 28); addItem(391, 28); addItem(391, 28); addItem(391, 28); addItem(391, 28); addItem(391, 28); sM("Take Food You Cheater!"); yell("["+playerName+"] Has Just Spawned A Full Bad Of Food What A Cheater!"); }

this can be used as many time you want, but how can you do that u cant use the command before like 5minutes after i have used it?

Read full topic
